headline: Air Products Appoints Megan Britt Vice President, Investor Relations
summary: Air Products (NYSE:APD) today announced that Megan Britt is appointed vice president, Investor Relations effective August 11, 2025. Britt succeeds Eric Guter who is leaving the Company to pursue other opportunities.
